title: User Management Dashboard for Honeydew Dating
description: I developed a dashboard to anable the management of a quickly growing userbase in Angular and Node.js utilizing Routing, Services and dependency injection to share data within the application and across both the front-end and backend. Some libraries that we used were Angular Forms, Angular2-jwt, NgRx/store, Angular Material, Apollo Angular and ngx pipes and RxJS.

title: Intent Manager for LIVEPERSON
description: Involved in creating reusable components using Angular 8 for building pages, components, and modules for Liverperson's proprietary NLU engine.

title: Location Based Intelligence for Infor
description: Responsible for design and development of web pages using Angular 6 using libraries such as Bootstrap, NgRx, CSS.

title: 2020 Campaign Finance Data Analysis
description: With a dataset provided by the FEC, I performed analysis on the data to determine employment statistics for each of the candidate’s principal campaign committees as well what industries donated the most to each candidate.

title: On this topic
description: Build a full stack web application to listen to podcasts based on certain topics/People/Themes. (Ongoing work)

title: The Sosiani Library Project
description: A website to provide information to a fundraising project (run in the Summer of 2018) towards a library in Eldoret, KE.

title: Sentiment Analysis on Rotten Tomatoes movie reviews
description: Implemented a Naïve Bayes classifier to categorize the sentiment of text from a Rotten Tomatoes Corpus

title: Kenya Web Project
description: Analysed the performance, download size, time spent on the top 500 Kenyan websites (according to Alexa as of July 2020) as well as performed some analysis on the dataset

title: Tamaduni
description: A culture progressive platform for curated content

title: Viables
description: a mobile app to track carton box reuse on campuses
